mapper.select: SELECT usr.USER_ID ,B.MEM_TYPE ,A.MEM_LVL ,B.MEM_CODE ,B.NAME ,C.ORG_CODE ,C.GRP_CODE ,C.DEPT_CODE ,B.BRNCH ,A.BRNCH_ID AS ORG_BRANCH FROM SYS0047M usr, ORG0005D A, ORG0001D B, ORG1001V C WHERE usr.USER_NAME = B.MEM_CODE AND B.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND usr.USER_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.STUS = 1 AND A.ORG_STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND usr.USER_ID = #{userId}
